description: This is the next wallet for IOTA after Chrysalis upgrade. This brings new features like re-usable addresses, fast confirmation delay of transactions and a lot more. Please follow this link to learn more about Firefly : [https://blog.iota.org/firefly-beta-release/](https://blog.iota.org/firefly-beta-release/).
summary: Firefly is IOTA's new official wallet for Chrysalis.
author: IOTA Foundation
